name: Silly Shenanigans
description: Absurd and cheerful challenges you can even play in front of your parents. Kindergarten for grown-ups!

dares.title: Baby Elephant Walk
dares.action: ${c_player}, walk around the room swinging your arm like an elephant’s trunk.

dares.title: Cartoon Voice
dares.action: ${c_player}, speak in the voice of any cartoon character for the next round.

dares.title: Athletic Chicken
dares.action: ${c_player}, act like a chicken that’s working out.

dares.title: Group Buzz
dares.action: All players buzz like bees for 10 seconds.

dares.title: Imaginary Lemon
dares.action: ${c_player}, pretend to eat a sour lemon and show your reaction.

dares.title: Slow Robot
dares.action: ${c_player}, move and talk like a robot for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Happy Kangaroo
dares.action: ${c_player}, hop around the room like a joyful kangaroo.

dares.title: Serious Little Frog
dares.action: ${c_player}, squat and act like a very serious frog for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Magic Wand
dares.action: ${c_player}, grab an imaginary wand and grant one player’s wish.

dares.title: Group Wave
dares.action: Players pass a hand wave around in turn; anyone who slips up drinks.

dares.title: Cheerful Conductor
dares.action: ${c_player}, happily conduct the other players like an orchestra.

dares.title: Lost Penguin
dares.action: ${c_player}, waddle around like a penguin who’s lost its home.

dares.title: Sock Talk
dares.action: ${c_player}, chat with your socks and ask how their day went.

dares.title: Frozen Yogurt
dares.action: ${c_player}, freeze in the most ridiculous pose for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Name Roll Call
dares.action: Each player quickly and humorously says their name until it comes back to ${c_player}.

dares.title: Puddle Jumps
dares.action: ${c_player}, jump in place like you’re splashing in a giant puddle.

dares.title: Invisibility Hat
dares.action: ${c_player}, put on an imaginary invisible hat and try to disappear.

dares.title: Unusual Musician
dares.action: ${c_player}, play a short tune on an imaginary instrument.

dares.title: Butterfly Parade
dares.action: All players flap their arms like butterfly wings for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Emotional Sandwich
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe a sandwich recipe using emotions instead of ingredients.

dares.title: Fish Out of Water
dares.action: ${c_player}, act like a fish trying to swim on land.

dares.title: Odd Storyteller
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell a short story about how ${r_player} became a superhero.

dares.title: Plasticine Person
dares.action: ${c_player}, move as if you’re made of modeling clay.

dares.title: Cheerful Applause
dares.action: All players clap loudly and happily for ${r_player} for 10 seconds.

dares.title: Silly Walk
dares.action: ${c_player}, demonstrate a walk that would suit ${r_player} perfectly.

dares.title: Unusual Singer
dares.action: ${c_player}, sing any song in the voice of an animal chosen by ${r_player}.

dares.title: Toy Conversation
dares.action: ${c_player}, talk to an imaginary toy and ask its advice about ${r_player}.

dares.title: Quick Joke
dares.action: ${c_player}, invent a short joke about ${r_player}.

dares.title: Silent Parody
dares.action: ${c_player}, perform a wordless parody of ${r_player}.

dares.title: Group Surprise
dares.action: All players make a surprised face and stare at ${r_player} for 10 seconds.

dares.title: Sleeping Beauty
dares.action: ${c_player}, act like Sleeping Beauty and ‘wake up’ when ${r_player} speaks.

dares.title: Strangest Question
dares.action: ${c_player}, ask ${r_player} the silliest question you can think of.

dares.title: Chair Road Trip
dares.action: ${c_player}, sit on a chair and pretend it’s a car. Drive around the room.

dares.title: Loud Confession
dares.action: ${c_player}, loudly confess to ${r_player} that you love candy more than friends.

dares.title: Dance of Joy
dares.action: All players dance happily until ${r_player} says “stop.”

dares.title: High-Five in the Air
dares.action: ${c_player}, give an imaginary high-five to each player, starting with ${r_player}.

dares.title: Weird Exercise
dares.action: ${c_player}, show the oddest exercise that ${r_player} should try to copy.

dares.title: Sudden Stop
dares.action: ${c_player}, start talking and freeze when ${r_player} commands.

dares.title: Awkward Pause
dares.action: ${c_player} and ${r_player}, stare at each other silently for 10 seconds without laughing.

dares.title: Most Important Announcement
dares.action: ${c_player}, loudly announce that ${r_player} is the best thing that ever happened to you.

dares.title: Letter from the Past
dares.action: ${c_player}, share what you would write to your past self in a letter.

dares.title: Star Guide
dares.action: ${c_player}, act as a night-sky guide and show the star that represents ${r_player}.

dares.title: Magic Garden
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe a magic garden where every player’s wishes grow.

dares.title: Butterfly Landing
dares.action: ${c_player}, mimic a butterfly landing on ${r_player}’s hand without touching them.

dares.title: Portrait of Happiness
dares.action: ${c_player}, explain what would appear in your portrait of absolute happiness.

dares.title: Rain Music
dares.action: All players gently tap fingers like rain while ${r_player} tells a story.

dares.title: Bedtime Story
dares.action: ${c_player}, create a brief, kind bedtime tale about ${r_player}’s adventures.

dares.title: Cloud Ride
dares.action: ${c_player}, pretend you’re flying on a cloud and invite ${r_player} to join.

dares.title: Dream within a Dream
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe the strangest dream ${r_player} could have.

dares.title: Living Statue
dares.action: ${c_player}, become a statue that comes to life and delivers an important message.

dares.title: Dream Ship
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell where you’d sail on a ship built from everyone’s dreams.

dares.title: Wind Music
dares.action: All players hum softly like the wind while ${r_player} dances like a leaf.

dares.title: Meeting Yourself
dares.action: ${c_player}, imagine meeting your future self. What would you ask?

dares.title: Brushless Painting
dares.action: ${c_player}, paint an imaginary picture in the air that reflects ${r_player}’s character.

dares.title: Letter to an Alien
dares.action: ${c_player}, explain to an alien why ${r_player} is the most important person on Earth.

dares.title: Bird Concert
dares.action: All players softly imitate birdsong while ${r_player} tells a short springtime story.

dares.title: Mood Flower
dares.action: ${c_player}, say which flower best reflects ${r_player}’s mood and why.

dares.title: Sky of Words
dares.action: ${c_player}, name three words that should be written in the sky to make everyone happy.

dares.title: Dream Island
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe your dream island if you could take only ${r_player} with you.

dares.title: Bridge of Friendship
dares.action: ${c_player} and ${r_player}, create a bridge with your arms symbolizing your friendship.

dares.title: Magic Lantern
dares.action: ${c_player}, imagine a lantern that shows happy memories. Describe one.

dares.title: City of Clouds
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe a city built of clouds and dreams.

dares.title: Snowflake Dance
dares.action: ${c_player}, gently dance like a snowflake landing on ${r_player}’s palm.

dares.title: Bird of Happiness
dares.action: ${c_player}, pretend to be a bird of happiness gifting ${r_player} an imaginary feather.

dares.title: Mirror of Fantasies
dares.action: ${c_player}, say what you would like to see in a magic mirror.

dares.title: Night Garden
dares.action: All players close their eyes and hum softly while ${r_player} talks about a night-garden walk.

dares.title: Sea of Wishes
dares.action: ${c_player}, imagine sailing on a sea where every wish comes true. Which wish do you choose?

dares.title: Flower Meadow
dares.action: ${c_player}, design a bouquet that would suit ${r_player} perfectly and explain why.

dares.title: Moon Whisper
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell what the moon whispers to ${r_player} tonight.

dares.title: Shadow Dance
dares.action: ${c_player}, use your hands to perform a shadow dance showing today’s mood.

dares.title: Living Book
dares.action: ${c_player}, imagine your favorite book came to life. What would it say?

dares.title: Traveler’s Song
dares.action: All players tap a rhythm while ${r_player} sings a short song about an imaginary trip.

dares.title: Treasure Island
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe your treasure island where emotions are the treasure, not money.

dares.title: Dream Fairy
dares.action: ${c_player}, imagine you’re a fairy granting sweet dreams. What would ${r_player} dream tonight?

dares.title: Castle in the Air
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe the castle you’d build in the clouds for all players.

dares.title: Voice of the Sea
dares.action: All players whisper like waves while ${r_player} tells what the sea is saying.

dares.title: Sunbeam
dares.action: ${c_player}, act like a sunbeam and warm ${r_player} with kind words.

dares.title: Road Home
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe a road home from any fantasy land.

dares.title: Kind Giant
dares.action: ${c_player}, imagine you’re a kind giant helping ${r_player}. How will you help?

dares.title: Forest of Whispers
dares.action: All players softly repeat “everything will be fine” while ${r_player} speaks about a magic forest walk.
